stripped_text: This program costs 1 credit less to install for each other installed icebreaker. (Programs trashed as part of installing this program don't count.) Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2 credits: +2 strength.
text: This program costs 1[credit] less to install for each other installed icebreaker. (Programs trashed as part of installing this program don’t count.) Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
title: Principia
